name: Kirubaharan Abimanyu
title: Full Stack Engineer
profile: I am a full stack developer who loves learning and building high quality software. My passion is to work on creative solutions to real problems alongside a team of smart, dedicated colleagues. I value collaboration and open communication and pride myself on building close working relationships with the people around me.

experience.title: Systems Engineer
points: Designed and developed dashboards to transform raw data into insights in an efficient manner to manipulate various metrics and trends for different Nielsen products using Agile methodology.
Being an integral part of  OpsConsole team for more than 4 years, have been involved in overall end to end SDLC activities and also DevOps.
Appreciation from client Nielsen for outstanding contribution to GTAM program implementation.

experience.title: Intern (Full Time)
points: Created PoC for Blockchain based Fundraising Platform and deployed in AWS Ubuntu server.
Explored various Blockchain Platforms like Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric, Corda, Zilliqa.

project.title: Blockchain based Fundraising Platform (BFP)
points: As part of MTech Software Engineering course at NUS, have completed the entire Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) Project.

The frontend consist of PHP and MySQL based website for creating and listing the campaigns while the backend consist of Graphene Blockchain to fund the campaigns and an android App to perform QR code based transaction with the Blockchain Platform using REST API.
Secured ‘A-’ grade (4.5/5.0) during the project evaluation.
